qas.question: ISO 9050 relates to standards for what?
ISO 10217 relates to standards for what?

answers.text: materials used in solar water heaters

qas.question: What is the name of the standard related to glass in building?
What is the name of the standard related to the materials used in solar water heaters?

context: The International Organization for Standardization has established a number of standards relating to solar energy equipment. For example, <a2_0>ISO 9050<a2_0/> relates to <a0_0>glass in building<a0_0/> while <a3_0>ISO 10217<a3_0/> relates to the <a1_0>materials used in solar water heaters<a1_0/>.
